value.name: Community Raises Over $200K for Father of Two Killed in LA Shooting Spree
value.description: The incident: A man in a Jeep Cherokee, identified as Carlos Lopez-Melendez, 50, went on five separate drive ... Lopez-Melendez, who fired at officers following a police pursuit, was killed by authorities during a standoff on the 91 Freeway in Fullerton.

value.name: Suspect in deadly LA shooting spree identified as 50-year-old man; motive remains unknown
value.description: Carlos Lopez-Melendez was killed during a standoff with police after a lengthy chase that ended on the 91 Freeway in Fullerton. Officers in police vehicles blocked in the white Jeep Cherokee ...
